  • Field Details

    • privateCardPointsMap

      public static final Map<Integer,Integer> privateCardPointsMap

  • Method Details

    • setExtraPoint

      public void setExtraPoint()
      extraPoint setter. Value can be only set to 1.

    • setBookshelfPoints

      public void setBookshelfPoints(Bookshelf bs) throws NullPointerException, BookshelfGridColIndexOutOfBoundsException, BookshelfGridRowIndexOutOfBoundsException, NullIndexValueException, NullPlayerBookshelfException
      bookshelfPoints setter.
      Parameters:
      bs - The bookshelf object to check for groups in.
      Throws:
      NullIndexValueException - If the index provided is null.
      BookshelfGridRowIndexOutOfBoundsException - If the bookshelf row index is out of bounds.
      BookshelfGridColIndexOutOfBoundsException - If the bookshelf column index is out of bounds.
      NullPlayerBookshelfException - If bookshelf is null.
      NullPointerException - Generic NPE.

    • setScoreBlockPoints

      public void setScoreBlockPoints(List<ScoreBlock> scoreBlocks) throws NullScoreBlockListException
      scoreBlockPoints setter.
      Parameters:
      scoreBlocks - The scoreblock list to get points from.
      Throws:
      NullScoreBlockListException - If the list of scoreblocks is null.

    • setPrivatePoints

      public void setPrivatePoints(Bookshelf bs, PrivateCard pc) throws NullPointerException, NullMatchedBlockCountException, NegativeMatchedBlockCountException
      privatePoints setter.
      Parameters:
      pc - The private card to get points from.
      Throws:
      NegativeMatchedBlockCountException - If the number of matched blocks to set is negative.
      NullMatchedBlockCountException - If the number of matched blocks to set is null.
      NullPointerException - Generic NPE.

      public Integer getPrivatePoints()
      privatePoints getter.
      Returns:
      The private points value.

    • getTotalScore

      public Integer getTotalScore()
      Getter method that returns the total score computing it from all the available scores.
      Returns:
      total score.

    • getVisibleScore

      public Integer getVisibleScore()
      Method used to retrieve the total score from a possibly obfuscated score. It ignores the invalidated privatescore. Used for sorting purposes in CLI.
      Returns:
      visible score.

    • getStringTotalScore

      public String getStringTotalScore()
      Method used to retrieve a string representing the total score. If score is obfuscated (private card points) it returns a partial score and a graphic indication of possibly missing points.
      Returns:
      String representing total score.
